channel.title: CKA Notes on SugnwooKim's place
channel.description: Recent content in CKA Notes on SugnwooKim's place

item.title: Pod
item.description: Create simple nginx pod kubectl run nginx --image=nginx Find image of pod kubectl describe pod new pods-bcvm4 | grep -i image View detail of pod kubectl get pods -o wide Create simple pod with dry run to yaml kubectl run redis --image redis --dry-run=client --o yaml > pod.yaml
